title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
EB: Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs. The second row should remain.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the Coolbar section.
3. Press the Delete button.
4. Confirm that the first item on the second row is deleted.
5. Check if the Launch item is moved to the first row.
6. Verify that the second row is not removed and remains intact.
